Text: Maria Callas was an American born, Greek dramatic coloratura soprano and perhaps the best-known opera singer of the post-World War II period.

Thank you for the wonderful release. But... Maria Callas is not Italian :-) As bane021 pointed out, she is Greek.

Guido

Which "Tosca" is this?  She made two complete commercial recordings of it, plus there numerous live recordings, including her final performances at the Met and Covent Garden in 1965.  Conductor and cast, please!
